original_title: How I Met My Girlfriend: Jessa Rhodes
overview: Every story has a beginning and your wild romance with the amazing Jessa Rhodes is not an exception. So how about you reach back to the root of all things and see how will you manage to seduce one of the hottest porn divas on Earth. Is it your natural charm? Your smooth seduction skills? Your sexual prowess? And how far will you get on the first date? Are you man enough for a third base or even a home run? Or will you stumble around second base like a rookie? Time to show your A-game, sweep Jessa off her feet and make her your girlfriend.
title: How I Met My Girlfriend: Jessa Rhodes
